SDG_GOAL: Goal: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET: Target: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all
STAT_CONC_DEF: Coverage of essential health services (defined as the average coverage of essential services based on tracer interventions that include reproductive, maternal, newborn and child health, infectious diseases, non-communicable diseases and service capacity and access, among the general and the most disadvantaged population).
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 3 : Permettre à tous de vivre en bonne santé et promouvoir le bien-être de tous à tout âge
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 3.8 : Faire en sorte que chacun bénéficie d’une couverture sanitaire universelle, comprenant une protection contre les risques financiers et donnant accès à des services de santé essentiels de qualité et à des médicaments et vaccins essentiels sûrs, efficaces, de qualité et d’un coût abordable.
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 3.8.1 : Couverture des services de santé essentiels
